Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining adventure where players dig deep underground to discover resources, upgrade equipment, and build structures. The game features real-time multiplayer through MQTT, procedurally generated worlds, a comprehensive shop system, and cloud-based save functionality. Players can explore vast underground caverns, mine valuable ores, trade with others, and build their mining empire while managing resources like fuel and hull integrity.
